issue.message: Single sentence error messages should not end with a period
issue.errorLine1: message = "Assign a default value to that field.",

issue.message: The issue summary should be shorter; typically just a 3-6 words; it's used as a topic header in HTML reports and in the IDE inspections window
issue.errorLine1: briefDescription = "Please assign default values \u200B\u200Bin Serializable Annotation's data class.",
